storyInfo: Picking up the pieces, the knights set out on a new quest.

attributes.content: It’s me. The spokesman incident is over——
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ......Platinum.
...Who are you? I’m looking for the director...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Doesn’t matter. You should have received the authorization code for this terminal.
Since you know about this channel, you aren’t one of the two Lazurites. So...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Just keep your suspicions to yourself and refrain from looking too hard.
What I am saying next will be between the 'Armorless Union', and nothing to do with the 'directors'.
......Alright.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: A squad of campaign knights crossed into the Twilight Wood in secret. This went unnoticed by the General Chamber of Commerce, so it likely has something to do with the Radiant Knight.
Silverlance...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Lazurite will take full responsibility for this matter, don’t trouble yourself.
Haah? Since when are they so responsible?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Your mission is to monitor the Radiant Knight in their stead.
The Radiant Knight... that’s a pain.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ——So they’ve got an even bigger pain over there?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Still unclear. The ripples from a single stone spread far. The return of the Radiant Knight has brought us a lot of trouble... In fact, we’re devoting too much of our attention on her.
...One more thing.
No matter what, do not take action against the Sarkaz with the Radiant Knight.
Those two Sarkaz... You seem to know a lot about them.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Confessarius and the Radiant Knight also belong to another 'company'. Will this matter be so simple...? I’m not sure.
Just handle your own tasks properly and don’t mess up like before.
We’ll be busier.
Ahh... It’s the phone again... Are they looking for Mr. Czarny?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: But Mr. Czarny... has been gone for a while.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...Hello?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: The spokesman?
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: Ah, no. Sorry, Mr. Czarny is currently——
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Wh-what?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I dialed the spokesman’s number, and you answered.
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: Therefore, you are the spokesman.
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: Huh? Wh-what? I don’t understand——
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Name.
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: Name.
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: Err, please call me Markowitz. I used to work for Słoma Food Company, until Mr. Czarny invited me to work with him...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: S-Sir? Is Mr. Czarny——?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Good day, Mr. Markowitz.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: Ah, sorry, Miss. I thought that——
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I am the Director and CEO of Słoma Food Company, you should be familiar with my voice. Mr. Markowitz, you are now officially dismissed.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: From now on, you no longer belong to the Słoma Food Company, nor the Mieszko Group——Please keep in mind at all times that you are representing the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: When the Major ends, you may choose to stay or leave. You will be generously compensated based on your performance.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: Right now, there are three tasks waiting for you. You have no right to question them.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: Firstly, ensure the smooth continuation of the Major. This is of the utmost importance.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: Secondly, guide the public opinion regarding the Radiant Knight and related matters. We are not asking for 'damage control', what we want are 'benefits' on top of that.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: Thirdly, some contacts from the Armorless Union will be arriving at your location within three minutes. Supervise them as they carry out their duties. If there are any issues, report directly to the General Chamber of Commerce’s Board of Directors.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: Wait...! I don’t want to be...!
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Is there anything you wish to say? Spokesman Markowitz?
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: I-I don’t think...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: No, I... I understand...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Very good. I wish you the best of luck.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: Haa... A dream... This is definitely a dream...
attributes.name: Spokesman Markowitz

attributes.content: I heard the good news. Czarny’s authority has been completely transferred to you, Spokesman... Markowitz, right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What do we do next? You might need a minute. I don’t mind taking a break.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I-I don’t understand. Why me...?
attributes.name: Spokesman Markowitz

attributes.content: Wait, wait. Aren’t you the same, Platinum? Why did you allow yourself to be pushed into this position? What should I do...?
attributes.name: Spokesman Markowitz

attributes.content: Who knows? Maybe they just wanted to see someone become as nasty as they are.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Don’t think too much when you’re in Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: But... Just look at me... I can’t even afford a decent suit. I...
attributes.name: Spokesman Markowitz

attributes.content: Right, Mr. Czarny must have arranged some tasks for you. You should know what the Armorless Union is doing——
attributes.name: Spokesman Markowitz

attributes.content: No idea.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I only know what I’m doing.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Th-then, what are you doing?
attributes.name: Spokesman Markowitz

attributes.content: Oh... Usually people stop asking when I answer like that. You...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Never mind. I screwed something up a while ago and now I have to deal with it.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Five Knight-Assassins were made while hunting a target. Then they disappeared.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Armorless Union w-went missing?
attributes.name: Spokesman Markowitz

attributes.content: ...Are you really prepared to know the truth?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I... I have no other choice.
attributes.name: Spokesman Markowitz

attributes.content: Really.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Pay close attention to the 'Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub' then. They’re more than just competition knights. They openly... oppose the Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...The Radiant Knight has returned?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Word on the street is she descended from the skies and rescued Maria.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Rescued?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: The Knights Association... No, it probably came from higher up. They arranged that match for Maria. The audience all believed that it was just a thrilling performance, but those with discerning eyes could tell...
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: They were going at it for real. If the Radiant Knight was any later, Maria would be dead.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: ...Are they giving up the game already?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Maybe we gave them more credit than they deserved. These things happen in every season of the Major——They don’t care.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: What they care about doesn’t matter. I never expected them to understand, but to think they don’t even want to keep up appearances...
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: What’s important is that in Kazimierz, no one cares.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: They’re telling people we’re out of competition for a while because of a training accident...
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: ...That’s ugly.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: 'That’s ugly.'
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: ...Pfft. Hahahaha. Hey, what the hell’s up with that? Isn’t that totally good for us?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: If they had gone through the National Council instead of scurrying around in the dark, we’d really be in trouble.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: You... You let yourself go after just relaxing for a bit.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Mhmm... Our opponents couldn’t wait any longer and acted first, but ended up giving us the win instead. How could I not be happy?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: When those two finish their jobs, we’ll finally get to the main point.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: What? Didn’t you get your fill in the arena?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Tch...... The more I cross weapons with that trash, the more I hate those knight nobles. What disgusts me the most is that I used to be one of them.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: *Sigh* So complicated.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: They don’t have a penny’s worth of dignity or faith. The knight nobles are total sellouts now.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Don’t get yourself worked up. This topic always does that to you. Don’t worry, they’ll get what’s coming to them.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Though, before that, we should straighten out the enemy right in front of us.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: ——The Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: We’ll expose them out in the open for all to see, yeah?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Hey Margaret, how long has it been since you’ve been home?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Your room is still as it used to be! I clean it all the time... Oh, I think we sold the furniture though...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: B-but, it’s fine! At least——
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria, just seeing you all makes me feel like I’ve returned home.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Margaret.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria, your equipment...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Oh! I went and borrowed your old stuff... Hehe, how is it? Fits me nicely, right?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yeah, it’s a nice fit. You’ve really grown up.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hehe... I’m as tall as you now.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You’ve worked hard, truly. I wasn’t able to talk with you properly in the arena earlier...... I’ve really missed you, Maria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Ehh... Sis, you’re making me embarrassed...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You’ve fought alone until now, but you survived, you’ve persisted.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I was aware what kind of impact my decision back then would have on Uncle and you, but I never thought that you would——
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: There’s something you absolutely have to do, that you’d never back down from, right?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Then you didn’t do anything wrong!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Besides... I was never able to become like you, tough inside and out...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But I’ve started to understand. At least, I can think about what Aunt Zofia has always said... I can think about what a knight truly is.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Even though I still couldn’t become like you... I’ve been able to get where I am today, with everyone’s help!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: If there were ever any beliefs that I held on to, they came from you! Because I too am a member of the Nearl family!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: B-But, Margaret, you can’t ever leave again, not like how you left six years ago...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I’ll follow you this time, no matter what happens to us in the end... I, I believe in you.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria, you... Heh, you’ve really grown up.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...E-Ehh? Where did all of that come from...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Anyway, just go upstairs and have a look——
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Margaret.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Uncle... this is...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Keep quiet.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Margaret. What did you come back for?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Don’t you know what it means for you to appear here?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You rescued Maria... But why did you return to Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Do you know how much your father and grandfather sacrificed to 'send you out'?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Yet you dare to appear here so brazenly... Do you think that the Association and the corporations aren’t watching your every step?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...I will join the Major.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Impossible.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I will retake the glory that belongs to the knights.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Glory is meaningless.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Meaning is in the eye of the beholder.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Kazimierz has changed. They have changed.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: —Yet I’m still here. We’re all still here.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Don’t be greedy... Margaret.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I imagined you would calm down after leaving Kazimierz... But this is your answer?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You’re wasting my time.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Uncle...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Enough.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: In the time I’ve spent talking to you, a mountain of documents has piled up waiting for me to handle. Don’t interrupt my work...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Leave Kazimierz before things turn worse. You’ve made a life for yourself elsewhere, just don’t come back anymore.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Uncle! How can you say that?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Uncle Młynar, I understand your decision. I still respect you just as I did back then.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I also hope for your support.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: —Understand?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You know nothing of what I’ve seen, what I’ve done. Yet you still hold on to your idealistic thoughts...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I was once lucky enough to catch a glimpse of hope. I have also experienced the shadow of war.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I’m merely choosing to continue believing in my faith, and to fight for it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Kazimierz will not change one bit, no matter how much the Radiant Knight sacrifices, no matter how much she wins.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Of course. Of that, I’m very clear.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Even so...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Even so.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Draw your blade, Margaret.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: U-Uncle?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: If you insist on being so stubborn, I have no choice but to to teach you how to 'give up' the hard way. To fall by my blade is far better than falling into the shadow of the Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...As you wish.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Those stupid competition knights are just a bunch of trash willing to be manipulated for the sake of money.
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: If the young mistress of the Nearl family were to have an accident as well, don’t even bother calling this campaign knight a knight anymore! I’ll go flip the National Council’s goddamned table myself!
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: ——That’s what the old man said.
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: ...Senomy, there’s no need to mimic him so convincingly...
Ehh, but he specifically instructed me to convey the exact message.
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: You don’t need to listen to everything he says.
He even said that if the Grand Knight didn’t agree, he’d go greet the Radiant Knight himself, even if he had to hobble all the way there.
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: He also said that if you sighed and cupped your forehead, reluctant to answer, he would——
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: Alright, alright... I know how unhappy he is. He hasn’t changed at all, still causing a ruckus in the Court Sprawiedliwi Kazimierz every day over what few accomplishments he has...
Don’t forget he is still an offender.

But the National Council, totally corrupted by the General Chamber of Commerce, has no right to convict my old man. They don’t representing the citizens or the law at all. They’re just representing themselves and the merchants behind them.
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: ...He taught you that as well?
No, I figured that one out myself.
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
Is that all?
Ah, there’s one more thing.
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
The people from Rhodes Island seem to have arrived.
attributes.name: Senomy
